name: Wrist Rosary - Black and Blue
description:
This glass bead rosary is perfect for wearing around your wrist or just slipping in your purse or pocket. 6mm black fasceted Hail Mary beads are separated by shining silver seed beads. 8mm light blue round beads for the Our Father’s are large and smooth – with the texture change you could pray this rosary in the dark. Where a centerpiece would be on a standard rosary, there is a holy medal of the Sacred Heart and Our Lady of Mt. Carmel on the reverse. Finished off with a beautiful crucifix.

	Memory wire allows this to be flexable to wear comfortably on any size wrist and does not poke or dig. Both ends are securely capped instead of sharp, curled wire. You could also hang this off your review mirror or dangling off your purse strap to show your Faith and your Flair!

name: Memory Wire Rosary - Crystal and Red
description:
This glass bead rosary has been strung on necklace-sized memory wire. While I would not suggest wearing it as a necklace, the size and shape is very comfortable for handling the rosary for medication and prayer. No tangling or knotting like chain-style rosaries. The cool, smooth beads slip through your fingertips with ease.

	6mm clear beads for the decades and red beads for Our Father have been capped to allow a different texture and beauty. A Miraculous Medal is in the place where a centerpiece would be and it is finished with a lovely silver plated crucifix with glorious shine.

	Show your Faith and your Flair with this unique piece.

name: Black hair sticks - green crystals
description:
Black hair sticks adorned with a Miraculous Medal and a simple crucifix. You get two sticks in this set so you can wear one or both at the same time. I wear two because I have very long, thick hair. Each stick is aprox 5 inches in length.

	Beads used to accent the hair sticks can be changed to a different color upon request. I have a good variety of colors available to choose from. Simply notify me before sending payment so I can accomodate your request.

	Show your faith and your flair!

name: Religious medal pin
description:
Beautiful small “kilt” pin adorned with colorful miniature holy medals and dangling bead with cross. Images of Virgin Mary and Child, Jesus of Divine Mercy, Mary Our Lady of Peace, and the Holy Family. 2” x 1/2” pin with 1 1/2” dangle.

	Show your faith and your flair!

name: Wrist Rosary - black and green
description:
This glass bead rosary is perfect for wearing around your wrist or just slipping in your purse or pocket. 6mm black fasceted Hail Mary beads are separated by shining silver seed beads. 8mm green round beads for the Our Father’s have just a touch of aurora borialis to make it shimmer. There is a Miraculous Medal where a centerpiece would be on a standard rosary and a lovely Celtic-inspired crucifix.

	Memory wire allows this to be flexable to wear comfortably on any size wrist and does not poke or dig. You could also hang this off your review mirror or dangling off your purse strap to show your Faith and your Flair!
